# province id = rotation in degrees, 0 is pointing right, then ccw)
# can be reloaded ingame by cmd: reloadtradewinds

#(JP) Not sure why negatives exist when purely positives work just as well and more logical.
#north = 90
#east = 0
#west = 180
#south = 270
